The "Chemical" entities in the paragraph are:

* p . Ala204Asp (a protein variant with an alanine residue at position 204 and an aspartic acid residue at position 204)
* p . Asp70Gly (a protein variant with an aspartic acid residue at position 70 and a glycine residue at position 70)
* p . Ala539Thr (a protein variant with an alanine residue at position 539 and a threonine residue at position 539)

Note that "p" is an abbreviation for "protein" and is not a chemical entity in itself.
